reviewtext: I love this card as it was easy as pie to install on my old Pentium III computer.I installed it on my open PCI slot and started the computer with the driver CD in. It asked for the location and that was easy to figure out. After that, I got on the Internet and the speed was just as advertised. My at home online speed is 1.5MB and that's what I get with the card. I highly recommend this card.
